name: Nuanced
description:
Add or remove nuance to pass obstacles and reach the goal. This was a quick 3 level puzzle platformer that I built on my own before Darkness Peering, and I think turned out quite well.

CONTROLS:

Use the  arrow keys to move and jump. Press Z to respawn after death, and swap nuance. Remember, you can swap nuance while you're in the air, and you won't be crushed if you get swapped into a solid object. Touch small flags for checkpoints, and reach the large flag to win and move on.
